mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product (product_seq, product_name, product_price, product_quantity, product_seller, product_filename, product_info, category_seq) values (product_seq.nextval, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_quantity}, #{product_seller}, #{product_filename}, #{product_info}, #{category_seq})
mapper.select:
SELECT product_seq, product_name, product_price, product_quantity, product_seller, product_filename, product_info, category_seq, product_readcnt, product_status, product_regdate, product_updatedate FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY product_seq DESC) rn, product_seq, product_name, product_price, product_quantity, product_seller, product_filename, product_info, category_seq, product_readcnt, product_status, product_regdate, product_updatedate FROM tbl_product
) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} + 1 AND #{pageNum} * #{amount}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_product SET product_name = #{product_name}, product_filename = #{product_filename}, product_info = #{product_info}, category_seq = #{category_seq}, product_updateDate = sysdate WHERE product_seq = #{product_seq}
